Events.OnCreate:
(block () (switch ; See if the mission is still available
(not (benedict_isMissionAvailable (objGetType gSource))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; OK ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch
; If Stormhound dies, the mission fails.
(eq (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'stormhoundID)) (msnFailure gSource) )
Events.OnMeetingDone:
(block ( (stormhoundObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'stormhoundID))) )
; Stormhound leaves
(shpCancelOrders stormhoundObj) (shpOrder stormhoundObj 'gate)
; Mission successful
(msnSuccess gSource) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Meet Benedict's informant in deep space. Authenticate with the codeword, "Stormhound".

" "System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: None" )
